description: Log of g.f. of numbers of preferential arrangements.
comments: If A= e.g.f. for A006989 and B = e.g.f. for A000670, then A = log(1+\int(B))'.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[2/((2 - E^x)*(2 + x - Log[2 - E^x])), {x, 0, 20}], x] * Range[0, 20]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 24 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
